Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal

[Groovy] Class DefaultVfsCopySpec

    • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal.DefaultVfsCopySpec
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      VfsCopySpec

      @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class DefaultVfsCopySpec

      Contains a gradlesque collection of sources that will eventually be converted to a a VfsURICollection. Inputs can be strings, File objects, VfsURI instances or closures. It is also used as an aid to delay evaluation of objects into stages or resolved URIs as late as possible.

      Authors:
      Schalk W. Cronj√©

      • Method Detail

        • @java.lang.Override VfsCopySpec apply(VfsOptions options)

          Applies an additional set of options to each source within the Spec Existing options will NOT be replaced.

          Returns:
          This updated copy spec
          Parameters:
          options - VfsOptions to be applied

        • @java.lang.Override java.lang.Iterable children()

          Allows for iteration of child specs

          Returns:
          An iterable collection for child specs. Never null.

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static DefaultVfsCopySpec create(VFS vfs, groovy.lang.Closure configurator)

          Creates an instance of a DefaultVfsCopySpec

          Returns:
          The configured DefaultVfsCopySpec instance
          Parameters:
          vfs - VFS that this copy spec will be associated with
          configurator - Initial configurating closure

        • @java.lang.Override DefaultVfsCopySpec from(java.lang.Object... sourcePaths)

          Specifies source URIs (files or directories) for a copy. The given paths are evaluated as per VFS.stageURI.

          Parameters:
          sourcePaths - Paths to source files for the copy

        • @java.lang.Override DefaultVfsCopySpec from(java.lang.Object sourcePath, groovy.lang.Closure configureClosure)

          Specifies the source files or directories for a copy along with a configurating closure. The given source path is evaluated as per VFS.stageURI.

          Parameters:
          sourcePath - Path to source for the copy
          configureClosure - closure for configuring the child CopySourceSpec

        • @java.lang.Override VfsURICollection getAllUriCollection()

          Returns a collection of staged or resolved URIs of this spec plus all children specs

          Returns:
          VfsURICollection. Never null.

        • @java.lang.Override java.lang.String getRelativePath()

          Returns the relative resolved from the initial object in a way that is suitable for appending to a URI

          Returns:
          Relative path (can be null)

        • @java.lang.Override VfsURICollection getUriCollection()

          Returns a collection of staged URIs within this spec, but not child copy specs All sources (supplied via @{code from()} will be evaluated at this time.

          Returns:
          VfsURICollection. Never null

        • @java.lang.Override VfsCopySpec into(java.lang.Object relativePath)

          Sets a relative path to the root

          Returns:
          This copy spec
          Parameters:
          relativePath - relative to a root of a parent copy spec

        • @java.lang.Override VfsCopySpec with(VfsCopySpec... sourceSpecs)

          Adds the given specs as children of this spec

          Returns:
          This copy spec.
          Parameters:
          sourceSpecs - The specs to add
